entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
